code:
stateDiagram-v2
  [IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream] --> Init
  Init --> Front: start

  state "Front Matter" as Front
  state TOC
  state Body
  state "Back Matter" as Back
  state End

  %% Events (IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)
  %% E_front: front signals present (IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)
  %% E_toc: toc signals (IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)
  %% E_heading: heading signals (IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)
  %% E_back: back signals (IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)
  %% E_eof: end of pages

  %% Guards
  %% G_toc_detected: we are on a TOC page or contiguous TOC continues
  %% G_anchor_match: page matches TOC anchor within ± tolerance
  %% G_after_last_chapter: expected chapters (IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode) reached
  %% G_sustained_back: >= 2 consecutive back-signal pages

  Front --> TOC: E_toc
  Front --> Body: E_heading || !E_toc && !E_front
  Front --> Front: E_front && !E_heading && !E_toc

  TOC --> TOC: G_toc_detected
  TOC --> Body: E_heading || !G_toc_detected

  Body --> Body: !(IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker))
  Body --> Back: E_back && (IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)

  Back --> Back: !E_eof
  Back --> End: E_eof

  Body --> End: E_eof
  TOC --> End: E_eof
  Front --> End: E_eof
  End --> [IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。

我把它加进去了，标签显示为 'IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController处理'，你看看合适吗？
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
这里必须包含 IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode 和 IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode 这一块。
